hero.title: Mustaqbalka aqoonta Islaamka, oo ay taageerayaan AI
hero.subtitle: Ka caawi dhisitaanka maktabadda ugu weyn, suurtagal u noqo in la helo fursad aad u ballaaran, oo fududee cilmi-baarista ugu dhiirrada badan oo ku saabsan cilmiga Islaamka qarniga 21aad.
hero.description: Iyada oo aad taageertayayo, Usul waxay ka dhigtay kumanaan buugag taariikhi ah mid si fudud loo heli karo, iyagoo gaaray tobanaan kun oo dadka isticmaala ah dunida oo dhan.

donate-widget.active-monthly-donors: {donors, number} tabarucaad joogto ah oo bil walba ah

features.0: Ururinta iyo keenista in hal meel lagu arko in ka badan 15,000 ilo Islaami ah oo la digitiyay, PDF iyo eBook ahaan, iyadoo leh muuqaal nadiif ah oo fiican in la akhriyo.
features.1: Wax-ka-beddelidda PDFs-da go'an ee loo rogay qaabab la dhisi karo oo ay mashiinnadu akhrin karaan si loo fududeeyo raadinta iyo falanqaynta.

two.title: Kordhinta Cilmi-baarista iyadoo la adeegsanayo Aaladaha AI-ku-shaqeeya

features.0: Awood raadin heer sare ah oo u oggolaanaysa isticmaalayaasha inay si deg deg ah u helaan xog sax ah.
features.1: Kaaliyeyaal AI-ku shaqeeya oo u fududeynaya cilmi-baarayaasha inay si sahlan ugu dhex socdaan xog badan oo qoraal ah.

three.title: Suurtagalinta Falanqayn Baaxad Leh
three.description: Taageeridda falanqayn baaxad weyn leh oo xog ururinyo isdhaafsi ah oo fure u ah fursado cusub oo cilmi-baaris Islaami ah. U saamaxaya marin hufan oo buugaag badan oo la isku halleyn karo ah, cilmi-baarayaashu waxay Usul ugu adeegsan karaan inay si Xawli iyo sax ah ugu raadiyaan fikrado iyo qaabab kala duwan oo la xidhiidha mowduucyo kala duwan.

roadmap.title: Khariidda Usul: Aragtiyadayada Mustaqbalka
roadmap.description: Tabarucaadkaagu wuxuu naga caawinayaa inaan gaarno yoolalkan socda:

0.title: Raadinta AI-ku-shaqaysa ee Ilo Islaami ah

features.0: Isticmaal aalado raadin casri ah iyo moodallo AI ah oo la hubo si cilmi-baarayaashu si deg deg ah u heli karaan macluumaad sax ah.
features.1: Samee marin hufan oo lagu dhex socdao qoraallo badan oo Islaami ah.

1.title: Ururo Islaami ah oo si gaar ah loo diyaariyay

features.0: La shaqee culimada hormuudka ah si loo sameeyo "urur core" musharraf ah dhammaan culuumta waaweyn ee Islaamka.
features.1: Abuur ururro si gaar ah loogu talagalay noocyo kala duwan.

features.0: Dhiso kaabayaasha iyo iskaashiga maktabadaha iyo kaydka internetka kale si loogu helo urur guud oo dhammaystiran oo qoraallo ah oo qaab dhismeed dijitaal ah lagu hayo.
features.1: Hubi in, iyadoo cilmiga internetka kobcayo, dhamaan shaqooyinka la heli karo, la baari karo, lana falanqayn karo.

be-part.title: Taageer Ujeedada Usul
be-part.description: Waxaad ku biirisay horumarinta cilmi-baarista waqti-gaaban iyo sii wadista horumarinta aaladaha cusub ee cilmi-baarista Islaamka ee waqti-dheer.

features.0: Dedeji cilmi-baarista Islaamka ee dhibaatooyinka casriga ah ee u baahan falanqayn degdeg ah oo laga dhex raadinayo ilo aad u badan—laga bilaabo AI akhlaaqda Islaamka iyo maamulkeeda ilaa go’aaminta in AI lagu isticmaalo fatwooyinka, ogaanshaha cudurrada, iyo arrimaha maaliyadda.
features.1: Dedeji waxbarashada Islaamka iyo cilmiga Islaamka guud ahaan, adiga oo dhisaya kaabayaasha loogu talagalay dugsiyada caalamiga ah, jaamacadaha, iyo maxkamadaha u baahan aaladaha cilmi-baarista Islaamiga ah ee la isku halleyn karo ama kuwa isbarbardhiga ah.
features.2: Ka qayb qaado door muhiim ah qaabaynta mustaqbalka sida loo ilaaliyo oo loo barto Islaamka

choose-amount.title: Dooro qadarka deeqdaada:
choose-amount.note: Lacagaha tabarucaadka ah waxaa lagu ururiyaa Seemore Foundation, oo ah urur aan faa'iido doon ahayn oo 501(c)(3) ah (xaalad sugitaan ah). Dhamaan tabarucaadka waa laga jari karaa canshuurta gudaha Mareykanka. Wixii su'aalo ah, fadlan nala soo xiriir donors@usul.ai.

success.title: Mahadsanid Deeqdaada!
success.description: Deeqsinimadaan waxay keentaa farqi dhab ah. Waxaan ku qadarinayaa taageerada aad noogu siiyeeyso howsha.

verification.title: Waa maxay email-kaaga?
verification.description: Email waxaa loo baahan yahay in laguugu diro rasiidhada iyo cusbooneysiinta daneeyaha.
verification.sent-code: Waxaan kaaga soo dirnay kood email-kaaga. Fadlan geli hoose si aad u dhammaystirto deeqda.
